a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Included are interstate, intrastate, extrasystemic, non-state conflicts, and one-sided violence that were ongoing
Data source: Uppsala Conflict Data Program (2023)
Note: Some conflicts affect several regions. The sum across all regions can therefore be higher than the global number.
